named-native-query.name: Hero.consultarHeroes
named-native-query.query: select h.people_id as peopleId, h.id as id, p.name as name, p.age as edad, p.age_rank as rangoEdad, h.wins as wins, h.hability as habilidad, hbl.name as nombreHabilidad from hero h inner join habilities hbl on (hbl.id = h.id) inner join people p on (p.id = h.people_id);

named-native-query.name: Hero.consultarHeroePorNombre
named-native-query.query: SELECT h.people_id AS peopleId, h.id AS id, p.name AS name, p.age AS edad, p.age_rank AS rangoEdad, h.wins AS wins, h.hability as habilidad, hbl.name as nombreHabilidad from hero h inner join habilities hbl on (hbl.id = h.id) inner join people p on (p.id = h.people_id) WHERE ((:pNombre <> '-1' and upper(p.name) like '%' || upper(:pNombre) || '%') or (:pNombre = '-1'));
